amendment.description: To make available $10,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, and $20,000,000 for Other Procurement, Air Force, for the implementation of IMT-2000 3G Standards Based Communications Information Extension capability for the Gulf States and key entities within the Northern Command Area of Responsibility.

action.text: Amendment SA 1942 proposed by Senator Landrieu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1942 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
